circuits.description: A single or list of QuantumCircuits.

expectation_operators.description: One or more expectation values to evaluate.

transpiler_config.description: A collection of kwargs passed to transpile.

run_config.description: A collection of kwargs passed to backend.run. Default is False.

return_stddev.description: Return upper-bound on standard deviation. Default is False.

skip_transpilation.description: Skip circuit transpilation. Default is False.

use_measurement_mitigation.description: Use measurement mitigation to improve results. Default is False.

return_values.description: A list of expectation values and optionally standard deviations.
